sentences.sContent: Apply a 6-mm (1/4-in) diameter bead of sealant to the window opening flanges.
sentences.sContent_eng: Apply a 6-mm (1/4-in) diameter bead of sealant to the window opening flanges.
sentences.sCn: 在窗户开口凸缘，使用一个直径为6-公厘（1/4-英寸）密封剂压条。

sentences.sContent: Apply a non-hardening sealant to the threads of the terminal box connection port flexible metal conduit and seal fitting for waterproofing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Apply a non-hardening sealant to the threads of the terminal box connection port flexible metal conduit and seal fitting for waterproofing.
sentences.sCn: 在接线盒连接口、挠性金属导管及密封件螺纹处涂上非硬化密封剂，用于防水。

sentences.sContent: The preparation methods of deketoxime type one-part RTV silicone rubber sealant on spread ability and for formed in place gasket were introduced respectively.
sentences.sContent_eng: The preparation methods of deketoxime type one-part RTV silicone rubber sealant on spread ability and for formed in place gasket were introduced respectively.
sentences.sCn: 介绍了可涂饰性及就地成形密封垫圈用脱酮肟型单组分RTV硅橡胶密封剂的配制方法。

phrases.pCn: 硅酮密封剂，硅酮嵌缝膏；硅密封胶
接口密封带；填缝料；夹口胶
窝沟封闭剂；齿面裂沟封剂

trans.tranOther: a substance that is put on the surface of something to protect it from air, water etc
